abort_index_segment_size.description: Segment size for transaction abort index. Controls how large each abort index segment can grow.
example: This setting controls the maximum size of abort index segments.
Smaller segments may improve memory usage but increase overhead.

append_chunk_size.description: Size of data chunks for append operations.

cloud_storage_access_key.description: Access key for cloud storage authentication. Used to authenticate with S3-compatible object storage services.

cleanup.policy.description: Determines how log segments are cleaned. **delete** removes old segments based on time or size. **compact** retains only the latest value for each key. **compact,delete** enables both strategies.

compression.type.description: Compression algorithm used for compressing message batches. Options include **none** (no compression), **gzip**, **snappy**, **lz4**, and **zstd**.
